icem.code.cautionsText1: 1. If BASE tag exists in the HEAD tag, please put the Basic Code before the Base tag, or in the BODY tag. Otherwise, Error happens on the old browsers such as Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0.
icem.code.cautionsText2:
2. Please put both Basic Code and Recommendation Code for the pages on which you want to show recommendation.
If Basic Code did not exist, Recommendation Code does not work.
icem.code.cautionsText3: 3. All the Recommendation needs to be prior to the Recommendation Code.
icem.code.cautionsText4: 4. If you added or edit Recommendation after you put Recommendation Code, Recommendation Code needs to be modified accordingly.

icem.menu.custom.content.example: Parenting has been more than a year, I recommend my friends to read a hundred doctors teach my child care, a book has a lot of mistrust. The United States currently has another of the popular parenting books. The book's author has 25 years of experience as a pediatrician, UCLA School of Medicine and professor of pediatrics department. The purpose of his writing this book is to teach parents how to reduce infant crying time, and thus make the baby can sleep better, but a hundred doctors child care, has a similar purpose. Two books I have read many times repeated, but also practical applications, so the two compare the contents of this book to teach some
